Title: Authorizes the impoundment of vehicles operated by intoxicated or impaired persons
Summary: Authorizes the impoundment of vehicles operated by intoxicated or impaired persons; authorizes the release of impounded vehicles to owners of such vehicles if certain criteria is met; authorizes a reasonable fee for towing and storage of such vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง1194, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the impoundment of vehicles operated by intoxicated and or impaired persons
